articles.title: Tom Fletcher misses wife Giovanna amid her I'm A Celebrity stint - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking on Friday's Lorraine, the McFly singer, 35, revealed that he's missing his I'm A Celebrity star wife as it's been the 'longest time we've been apart since we were 13'
articles.content:
